description.value:
[Addictive] Lasts ~1 Hour, grants +1 to user's Toughness Bonus, doesn't stack. Every dose past the first within 24 hours inflicts 1d10+10 Agility Damage as used is wracked with pain. User's skin turns a greyish green colour and crusts over for the duration.

Requirements

Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -10 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
